<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Customer"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v1/customers/{customerID}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The **Delete Customer** endpoint allows you to remove a specific customer record from your organization. Use this endpoint with caution to manage your customer database effectively.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Unique identifier of the customer.","name":"customerID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
